definition: to murder a superior/to murder one's parent

sentences.english: He was arrested for being the regicide .
sentences.chinese: 他因弒君的行爲被捕了。

sentences.english: Can that be the cause of my being suspected of parricide ?
sentences.chinese: 難道是因爲它我才被懷疑犯下了弒君之罪嗎？

sentences.english: The beheading of Mary Queen of Scots was an act of regicide.
sentences.chinese: 把蘇格蘭女王瑪麗斬首是弒君行爲。

sentences.english: He had come to believe that regicide was an act of justice and the will of God.
sentences.chinese: 他終於相信，弒君是一個正義的行動和意志的上帝。

definition: minister not afraid to give forthright criticism
King Wu of Zhou 周武王[Zhou1 Wu3 wang2] overthrows tyrant Zhou of Shang 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2]
to murder a superior/to murder one's parent
King Gou Jian of Yue (c. 470 BC), sometimes considered one of the Five Hegemons 春秋五霸
Rizhilu or Record of daily study, by early Confucian philosopher Gu Yanwu 顧炎武|顾炎武
Mr Gongyang's Annals or commentary on 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], early history, probably written by multiple authors during Han dynasty, same as 公羊春秋[Gong1 yang2 Chun1 qiu1]
to praise sb in his presence
